page.title: 05CLUBS,ELMLEY CASTLE AREA
page.content: Village social activities centre around the village halls in Elmley Castle and Little Comberton,the playing field in Elmley Castle and the Rectory in Little Comberton. {Elmley Castle}- Cricket Club,Football, British Legion,Friends and Neighbours, Women's Institute,Scouts,Venture Scouts,Cubs,Conservatives,P.T.A.Elmley Castle First School,Pubs(darts and snooker). {Little Comberton }-Social Club,Women's Institute,Nature Conservation Trust, Playgroup,Conservatives,Sunday School. {Rectory}-Young Wives,Women's Fellowship,Link Choir. Individuals within the community organise fund-raising activities for many local and national charities.
